alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche; Kiowa; Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 03 at 9:45PM CDT until October 04 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KIOWA...NORTHWESTERN BARBER...NORTHERN COMANCHE AND SOUTHWESTERN PRATT COUNTIES... At 944 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Haviland to near Protection, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Wilmore, Lake Coldwater, Wellsford, Cullison, Belvidere, Croft, Pratt, Coats and Sun City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
